title: Why Iran's response to a US attack could be different this time
summary_full: Tehran has threatened to treat an attack by the US as part of last summer's war, and its response could be more dramatic.
summary_public: Tehran has threatened to treat an attack by the US as part of last summer's war, and its response could be more dramatic.
